attributes.additional_details:
A sizeable section of the British public now believe that there is something tangible and worth investigating in relation to the many reports  of UFO phenomena.

The Government to set up an enquiry into the UFO phenomena. All documentation relating to UFO phenomena and / or the existence of extraterrestrial entities  held by, or known to the Government to be released to the public. The findings of the enquiry to be debated in the house of commons.
